Shots wrack Prebons still boby causing him to begin to sink. the tides grab
hold of the Trainer leader forcing him further out to sea.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2001 8:33 PM
Subject: Re: Arise.....(All NEED to read this, it affects everybody)


> ::Zardus/FZ/Repressor/Perndabot/Astral/Recklessa/Starlight/Fenox/Gripl
> ash/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
>
> Zardus frowns as he hears the voice saying "Arise, Optimus Prime,"
> paying little attention to it. It didn't affect his plans. The Vok
> being, however, hears and pays interest, looking through the planet.
> Optimus Prime was back, but the Optimus Prime on the Ark was still
> there. This one must have come from the future.
>
> Near him, Astral looks very surprised, but says nothing since his
> commander didn't.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "What in the pit is that?!" Repressor exclaims as the voice reaches
> him and Perndabot. They and FZ were just entering the CR room of the
> Iron Fist.
>
> "It's nothing important. Simply an announcement," FZ replies, his
> mind instructed by Zardus'. Repressor and Perndabot nod doubtfully.
> All three bots enter CR tanks.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recklessa, in a CR tank, doesn't hear the voice. Griplash, also in
> one, fails to hear it as well.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Starlight stops her decent as she hears the voice, listening for a
> second but hearing nothing more. She shruggs it off, opening fire on
> Prebon with her rifle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Fenox's head jerks up as she hears the words. She looks at D,
> alarmed. "Did you hear that?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> In the Alliance base, a door slides open and Reptilica and
> Bloodystrike emerge. The voice had woken them from their slumber that
> had been forced by Desmonus after she had almost drained them of
> mechfluid, but they hadn't heard it. They also didn't remember
> Desmonus drinking either of their mechfluid.
>
> Both bots set off for the bridge of the Iron Fist.
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> > ::Dark Prime-->Optimus Prime::
> >
> >     He had been wandering for days, not caring if he returned to
> Nod. Suddenly he got a feeling that something wasn't right in the
> Universe. There were too many evils, and and age old riverly could
> not be brought to a close.
> >     Galvatron was alive. Optimus Prime was stuck within the
> Evilness of Dark Prime. They would not be able to fight both being
> evil. Primus needed to be sated.
> >     The Time Gateway (remember that?) Glowed with a firey reddness.
> The source of Prime's evil and his lust for the power of Cronus was
> seated there. The Gateway exploded, shattering into thousands of
> peices.
> >     Dark Prime fell to his knees. His body was wracked with pain.
> His chest panel opened of it's own will (well, not really) and the
> Autobot Matrix emerged. It floated out from Prime's chest and then it
> opened. Releasing all of Prime's goodness back into him, but leaving
> just enough evil to get the job done. Prime's body went through a
> change as well, from his knees to his feet became Blue, his upper
> legs became white, his arms and chest became the familiar Prime Red.
> His mouth plate became silver, along with much of his face, the
> helmet that surrounded it bacame blue, his hands also became Blue.
> >     As the Matrix went back into his chest a giant light emitted
> from him, it covered the entire planet (got permission) everything on
> the planet saw this light.
> >     A voice boomed over the planet, all bots could hear this as
> well, no matter where they were. The voice said, "Arise, Optimus
> Prime."
> >     Dark Prime had died, Optimus Prime was reborn, with a new drive.
> >
> > (Please add Dark Prime to the Matrix)
>
>
>
>
>
